name: Cisco | IOSXR | Environment | Temperature Out of Range (SYSLOG)
description: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-2-TEMP : Hotpoint temp sensor(slot 19) temperature has reached MINOR level at 66(C)

patterns.value_re: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-2-TEMP : Hotpoint temp sensor\((?P<name>.+)\) temperature has reached (?P<threshold>\S+) level at (?P<measure>\d+)\(C\)

name: Cisco | IOSXR | Environment | Temperature Returned to Normal Range (SYSLOG)
description: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-2-TEMP_CLEAR : Hotpoint temp sensor(slot 19) temperature has returned to a normal level at 65(C)
event_class__name: Environment | Temperature Returned to Normal Range

patterns.value_re: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-2-TEMP_CLEAR : Hotpoint temp sensor\((?P<name>.+)\) temperature has returned to a (?P<threshold>normal) level at (?P<measure>\d+)\(C\)
